short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically group your tabs by page opener

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables you to automatically group your tabs by page opener.

It organizes all new tabs that are opened from another tab into the same group, saving you time and hassle. You can easily switch between different groups of tabs and keep track of your browsing activity.

You can also use a convenient keyboard shortcut to close the current group of tabs:
- For MacOS: Cmd + E
- For Windows and Linux: Ctrl + E

I appreciate your feedback and suggestions for improvement!
